price: I tako oni nisu mogli ni preći, niti su ga mogli prokopati.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡطَٰعُوٓاْ أَن يَظۡهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ لَهُۥ نَقۡبٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: famā is'ṭāʿū an yaẓharūhu wamā is'taṭāʿū lahu naqban
